image_analysis.description: A four-page spread of a legal deposition transcript. The document is laid out with two pages on the top row (pages 65 and 67) and two pages on the bottom row (pages 66 and 68). Each page has timestamps and line numbers in the left margin, with the dialogue of the deposition in the main body. Headers contain page numbers, and footers contain deposition service information, page range, date/time, and a document identifier.
image_analysis.layout: Four-page grid layout, two pages per row. Each page is a single column of text with left-aligned timestamps and line numbers.

document_metadata.subject: Deposition testimony regarding allegations against Jeffrey Epstein, including information from an 89-page police report, trash covers, flight logs, and the involvement of Virginia Roberts.

notes: The document is a deposition transcript. The speakers are identified as 'Q.' (Questioner) and 'A.' (Answerer). The content discusses a police investigation into Jeffrey Epstein. The name 'Maxwell' is mentioned without a first name.
